channel.title: Vindictive PVP - Beta Open! Completely Unrestricted Spawn!
channel.description:
[img]http://i76.servimg.com/u/f76/16/16/97/89/coolte10.png[/img]
Beta Testing is now open through the weekend. I will keep the server on as much as possible, and all Beta Testers will receive compensation upon opening in December! I have decided to make it unrestricted spawn so you can come in spawn all pvp shop items and have a good time! This is a testing period so I ask that you please experience as much as possible so that exploits can be rectified. Report all issues to me either ingame, on the forums, or on here. Thanks everyone!
[size=36pt]Client Download:[/size]https://www.dropbox.com/s/u0n6ho9brvprtqi/Vindictive%20PVP.zip Forums: [url=http://vindictive-pvp.forumotion.com]vindictive-pvp.forumotion.com[/url]
Commands List [code] Player - ::players ::item (ID) (Amount) ::kdr ::100kills ::250kills ::500kills ::setlevel (ID) (Level) ::commands ::char ::switch 0, 1, 2 ::home ::lumbridge ::falador1 ::falador2 ::varrock1 ::varrock2 ::easts ::wests ::greaters ::52portals ::mb ::edgedung ::teleports ::gearcommands ::funpk ::food ::pots ::hybrid ::welfbrid ::tribrid ::purebrid ::rangetank ::range ::dharoks ::melee ::zerker ::vote ::forums ::bank ::claim ::changepassword (desired password) ::xplock ::empty ::barrage ::master ::tb ::veng ::skull ::pure
[/code]
Media- [img]http://i76.servimg.com/u/f76/16/16/97/89/backgr10.jpg[/img] [img]http://i56.servimg.com/u/f56/16/16/97/89/110.png[/img] [img]http://i56.servimg.com/u/f56/16/16/97/89/210.png[/img] [img]http://i76.servimg.com/u/f76/16/16/97/89/110.png[/img] [img]http://i39.servimg.com/u/f39/16/16/97/89/110.png[/img] [img]http://i39.servimg.com/u/f39/16/16/97/89/310.png[/img] [img]http://i39.servimg.com/u/f39/16/16/97/89/410.png[/img] [img]http://i39.servimg.com/u/f39/16/16/97/89/510.png[/img] [img]http://i39.servimg.com/u/f39/16/16/97/89/610.png[/img]

I’ll give you a 24 hour period to decide if you’d like me to lock this thread or not.
If you’d like to reopen this thread at any time after that period, just send me a private message and I’ll unlock this thread.

item.description:
@nolan2131 wrote:

Beta Testing is now open through the weekend. I will keep the server on as much as possible, and all Beta Testers will receive compensation upon opening in December! I have decided to make it unrestricted spawn so you can come in spawn all pvp shop items and have a good time! This is a testing period so I ask that you please experience as much as possible so that exploits can be rectified. Report all issues to me either ingame, on the forums, or on here. Thanks everyone!

[size=36pt]Client Download:[/size]https://www.dropbox.com/s/u0n6ho9brvprtqi/Vindictive%20PVP.zip
Forums: vindictive-pvp.forumotion.com
